record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 1983
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 1983 -- (House of Representatives - April 02, 2008)

[Page: H1904]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent to remove my name as a cosponsor of H.R. 1983.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentlewoman from Missouri?
